pages.text: You may think flowers are not very threatening but you would be wrong! Tricky mimics have used their powers to disguise themselves as mimics.$(br)$(br)If you manage to kill one of these mimics you will be rewarded with extra loot and exp.

pages.title: Allium Mimic
pages.text: The Allium Mimic will disguise itself among allium flowers. When killed they will drop some chorus fruits.

pages.title: Azure Bluet Mimic
pages.text: The Azure Bluet Mimic takes on the appearance of a wandering trader and will disguise itself among azure bluet flowers. When killed they will drop an emerald.

pages.title: Blue Orchid Mimic
pages.text: The Blue Orchid Mimic takes on the appearance of a drowned and will disguise itself among blue orchids. When killed they will drop a soul lantern.

pages.title: Allium Mimic
pages.text: The Cornflower Mimic takes on the appearance of a phantom and will disguise itself among cornflowers. When killed they will drop some feathers.

pages.title: Allium Mimic
pages.text: The Dandelion Mimic takes on the appearance of a Zombie Villager and will disguise itself among dandelions. When killed they will drop a golden apple.

pages.title: Lilac Mimic
pages.text: The Lilac Mimic takes on the appearance of a shulker and will disguise itself among lilacs. When killed they will drop an end crystal.

pages.title: Lily of the Valley Mimic
pages.text: The Lily of the Valley Mimic takes on the appearance of a ghast and will disguise itself among valley lily. When killed they will drop some iron ingots.

pages.title: Orange Tulip Mimic
pages.text: The Orange Tulip Mimic takes on the appearance of a Snow Golem and will disguise itself among orange tulips. When killed they will drop a powdered snow bucket.

pages.title: Oxeye Daisy Mimic
pages.text: The Oxeye Daisy Mimic takes on the appearance of a Stray and will disguise itself among Oxeye Daisies. When killed they will drop some spectral arrows.

pages.title: Peony Mimic
pages.text: The Peony Mimic takes on the appearance of a Vindicator and will disguise itself among peonies. When killed they will drop a cauldron.

pages.title: Pink Tulip Mimic
pages.text: The Pink Tulip Mimic takes on the appearance of a Slime and will disguise itself among pink tulips. When killed they will drop some poisonous potatoes.

pages.title: Poppy Mimic
pages.text: The Poppy Mimic takes on the appearance of a Cave Spider and will disguise itself among poppies. When killed they will drop some cobwebs.

pages.title: Red Tulip Mimic
pages.text: The Red Tulip Mimic takes on the appearance of a Spider and will disguise itself among red tulips. When killed they will drop a rabbit foot.

pages.title: Rose Bush Mimic
pages.text: The Rose Bush Mimic takes on the appearance of a Magma Cube and will disguise itself among rose bushes. When killed they will drop some magma blocks.

pages.title: Sunflower Mimic
pages.text: The Sunflower Mimic takes on the appearance of a Creeper and will disguise itself among sunflowers. When killed they will drop some TNT.

pages.title: Torchflower Mimic
pages.text: The Torchflower Mimic takes on the appearance of a Blaze and will disguise itself among torchflowers. When killed they will drop some fire charges.

pages.title: White Tulip Mimic
pages.text: The White Tulip Mimic takes on the appearance of a Skeleton and will disguise itself among white tulips. When killed they will drop a cake.

pages.title: Wither Rose Mimic
pages.text: The Wither Rose Mimic takes on the appearance of a Wither Skeleton and will disguise itself among wither roses. When killed they will drop some netherite scraps.
